columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource ID.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state to track the async operation status.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: sql_image_offer
columns.description: SQL image offer for the SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: sql_image_sku
columns.description: SQL Server edition type. Possible values include: 'Developer', 'Express', 'Standard', 'Enterprise', 'Web'.

columns.name: sql_management
columns.description: SQL Server Management type. Possible values include: 'Full', 'LightWeight', 'NoAgent'.

columns.name: sql_server_license_type
columns.description: SQL server license type for the SQL virtual machine. Possible values include: 'PAYG', 'AHUB', 'DR'.

columns.name: sql_virtual_machine_group_resource_id
columns.description: ARM resource id of the SQL virtual machine group this SQL virtual machine is or will be part of.

columns.name: virtual_machine_resource_id
columns.description: ARM resource id of underlying virtual machine created from SQL marketplace image.

columns.name: auto_backup_settings
columns.description: Auto backup settings for SQL Server.

columns.name: auto_patching_settings
columns.description: Auto patching settings for applying critical security updates to SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: Azure Active Directory identity for the SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: key_vault_credential_settings
columns.description: Key vault credential settings for the SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: server_configurations_management_settings
columns.description: SQL server configuration management settings for the SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: storage_configuration_settings
columns.description: Storage configuration settings for the SQL virtual machine.

columns.name: wsfc_domain_credentials
columns.description: Domain credentials for setting up Windows Server Failover Cluster for SQL availability group.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
